about_the_game:
Welcome to Paper Battlefield, a strategy game where warfare takes place in a drawn world bound by the limits of a notebook! Experience a unique real-time strategy experience where every battle unfolds on the pages of a sketchbook, and all your units and structures are drawn with ink!

Features:

  • Battle on the Page: Engage in dynamic real-time strategy battles on a whimsical notebook battlefield. Watch as your tactical decisions come to life amidst doodles and sketches.

  • Resource Management: Gather ink to fuel your military might. Manage resources efficiently to build a formidable base, craft powerful units, and improve their effectiveness.

  • Base Building: Construct and upgrade your base with a variety of structures. Design your base layout strategically to fend off enemy attacks and ensure a steady supply of resources.

  • Hire and Command Units: Recruit a diverse array of drawn combat units, each with unique characteristics. Command your units with precision, utilizing their strengths to dominate the battlefield.

  • Develop Strategies: Adapt your strategies as the battle unfolds. Each game is a new challenge, with unpredictable scenarios.

Join the battle in Paper Battlefield and draw your path to victory!
